summary: Unleash the power of Foxfire with the Ring of Kitsune!
descriptionHtml:
================
Description
================

Unleash the power of Foxfire with the Ring of Kitsune!

Based on the story of the Oni-Kitsune, the mythical Fox-Demon of Japanese folklore, The Ring Of Kitsune is a unique enchanted ring with dark and special hidden magic effects that activate when the caster is truly in danger of dying. For more details, read on...


================
What Does It Do?
================
When equipped, The Ring Of Kitsune does nothing... until you\'re on the verge of death.

At 33% health, there is a 20% chance that any subsequent damage you take will automatically trigger the spell \"Kitsune\'s Vengance.\" Kitsune\'s Vengance staggers and damages opponents close to the caster with a small explosion, cloaks the bearer of the ring in fire, fortifies their destruction skill by 10 points, heals 1 additional point of health per second and offers a 50% resistance to all fire damage. This effect lasts for 45 seconds.

However, there is more to the ring as well. Instead of the Kitsune\'s Vengance, there is a 5% chance that the greater power \"Kitsune\'s Wrath\" will be triggered instead. Kitsune\'s Wrath triggers a large, damaging explosion, cloaks the bearer of the ring in fire, fortifies Destruction by 15 points, provides 100% immunity to fire damage, heals 2 additional points of health per second, and equips spell \"Foxfire\" to the player\'s hands. Foxfire is a high-damage, close-range concentration fire spell which ignores fire resistance and lasts for 1.65 seconds, and burns targets for 3 seconds. If you have the Destruction Dual-Casting perk, them dual-casting Foxfire launches 6 fireballs which create small, blinding explosions on impact. While Kitsune\'s Wrath is active, the menu cannot be opened. This effect also lasts for 45 seconds.

================
How Do I Get It?
================
The Ring Of Kitsune is a special enchanted ring which is created at the Atronach Forge using the following
-1 Black Soul Gem
-1 Fire Salt
-1 Daedra Heart
-1 Charcoal
-1 Ebony Ingot
-1 Fox Pelt

The crafting recipe, as well as a backstory for the ring, can be found on the table at the entrance to the Atronach Forge.

================
From the Author
================
This mod was a fun project for me, a way to enjoy learning new skills in the CK and combining all of the techniques I have learnt since I started modding to create something a little different which helped me greatly with understanding and appreciating the CK and its many features and functions. Consequentially, there won\'t be a great deal of updating going on (unless there\'s bugs with it) since I\'ve already learnt the lessons I wanted to learn during this project, and have begun turning the new skills to my older mods.

Also, apologies in advance for the terrible image quality. I accidentally added an extra 0 when resizing the images, and got a bit over-zealous with the shrinking. XD It\'s 2am in the morning now, so I\'m going to bed. I\'ll do some new images later.

Thanks for checking it out,
Daedalus-AI
================
Credits
================

Thanks to johnwayne1930, for the high-res Ring of Khajiiti diffuse texture that The Ring of Kitsune is based on.
Thanks to Bethesda, for reasons that should be obvious.
